name: Pick Your Poison (itch) (SethBrock)
description:
A game developed by Seth Brock, Sam Smith, Camron Williams, and Sentry at Azusa Pacific University.

The player is a deceased man in medieval times and who appears in a very dark environment, save for a tavern. They’re told by a mysterious voice that they must go inside the tavern to begin the trial. As they near the tavern the voice tells them that they have a limited time to learn how they died in order to make it into heaven. Can the player piece together the mystery of the character’s life before the time runs out? 

Controls:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Jump
